name: 2D Platform FINAL - Seth Somers
description:
Actual Modifications Made:

1) Game music added courtesy of Tsorthan Grove called "Matter of Time" found on opengameart.org

2) "Level 3" added with more difficulty than previous level.

3) "Level 4" added with more difficulty than Level 3.

4) On "Level Select" menu, "Level 3" and "Level 4" buttons added and connected to levels.

Created by Seth Somers
